channel.title: Snikket on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Snikket on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Snikket
item.description: Snikket could be the perfect message and phone app for me, and my close family. I bought a virtual raspberry pi from www.mythic-beasts.com just for the purpose of running snikket but it is not to be.
